Decimal - Class in <Unnamed>
This is an implementation of a Decimal class which is used for binary and hex conversion.

decimal - Variable in class Hexadecimal
 
decToBin() - Method in class Decimal
This method converts decimal to binary using three methods.
decToHex() - Method in class Decimal
This method converts decimal to hexadecimal using three methods.
display() - Method in class Menu
This method displays the main menu that contains options for conversions.
